installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'debian:buster-slim'
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates wget

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
if [ ${SL_BETA} ]; then
    echo -e "Using beta version of the server."
    if [ "${SL_BETA_NAME}" == "" ]; then
        echo -e "Beta name empty, falling back to default install."
        ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit
    else
        if [ "${SL_BETA_PASS}" == "" ]; then
            ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} -beta ${SL_BETA_NAME} validate +quit
        else
            ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} -beta ${SL_BETA_NAME} -betapassword ${SL_BETA_PASS} validate +quit
        fi
    fi
else
    ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit
fi

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

URLMA=$(curl https://api.github.com/repos/ServerMod/MultiAdmin/releases | grep browser_download_url | cut -d '"' -f 4 | grep MultiAdmin.exe | head -1)
wget -P /mnt/server/ $URLMA
chmod +x /mnt/server/MultiAdmin.exe

if [ ${USE_EXILED} ]; then
    echo -e "Using EXILED!"
    URL=$(curl https://api.github.com/repos/galaxy119/EXILED/releases | grep browser_download_url | cut -d '"' -f 4 | grep Exiled.tar.gz | head -1)
    wget -P /tmp/EXILED/ $URL
    cd /tmp/EXILED/
    mkdir /tmp/EXILED_out
    tar -C /tmp/EXILED_out/ -xvf /tmp/EXILED/Exiled.tar.gz
    mv -f /tmp/EXILED_out/Assembly-CSharp.dll /mnt/server/SCPSL_Data/Managed/
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/.config/EXILED/
    mv -f /tmp/EXILED_out/EXILED/ /mnt/server/.config/
fi
